mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (e_name, e_starttime, e_endtime, e_peoplecnt, adminId) VALUES (#{e_name}, #{e_starttime}, #{e_endtime}, #{e_peoplecnt}, #{adminId})
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET e_name=#{e_name}, e_starttime=#{e_starttime}, e_endtime=#{e_endtime}, e_peoplecnt=#{e_peoplecnt}, adminId=#{adminId} WHERE e_no=#{e_no}
